long_description: You might say it takes its design from a backpacking tent, for this Outdoor Research Swift cap features mesh body for breathability and a protective rainfly on top! 3-panel mesh completely covers the top of the head, providing breathability for coolness and wicking away dampness for comfort. Another 3 panels rest lightly above the forehead and scalp (and above the mesh) where they stand ready to block any wind and rain that dare show. Features a handsome accent color along edge of brim and in forehead logo. Adjustable closure in back for a snug, comfortable fit.
short_description: You might say it takes its design from a backpacking tent, for this Outdoor Research Swift cap features mesh body for breathability and a protective rainfly on top!
